NewsArticle.Title: Reset Notes
NewsArticle.Content: Reset Notes for March 13, 2015 - Extended Double EXP/AB Event for Muisir Training/Hunting Areas - Stats added to Lumen Amulet when equipped - HP/MP/STR/INT/WIS/CON/DEX - Increased Timers in Muisir Training/Hunting Areas * 3hrs to complete each Training area instead of 30,45,60 minutes etc. * 6hrs to complete each Hunting area instead of hrs
